arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: PSG hosts Bayern Munich at the Parc des Princes, both teams aiming to preserve their flawless records so far in this season’s 2025-26 UEFA Champions League. This fixture promises a thrilling contest, featuring the reigning European champions facing one of the continent’s hottest teams right now. arts.ttl: Bayern Munich XI vs PSG – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich visit Parc des Princes on Tuesday as they face PSG in their next UEFA Champions League fixture. The German champions will look to continue their hot streak and win a 16th consecutive match this season in all competitions against the reigning champions. arts.sum: This Tuesday at 9 p.m. (live on Canal+), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will host Bayern Munich (2nd) at the Parc des Princes for the fourth matchday of the 2025–2026 UEFA Champions League. arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Kompany admires the Parisian project, calling it “a revolutionary idea”

arts.ttl: PSG vs. Bayern Munich: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: The two European giants have yet to drop points in the Champions League this season.

arts.ttl: Paris Saint-Germain vs. Bayern Munich: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and teams news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich put their record-breaking winning start to 2025/26 on the line against UEFA Champions League holders Paris Saint-Germain at the Parc des Princes on Tuesday (kick-off: 9pm CET). Bayern are six-time Champions League/ European Cup winners, most recently winning the competition in 2019/20 after beating PSG in the final.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Paris Lineup announced with Mayulu

arts.ttl: Hakimi opens up: dreams, Champions League and PSG vs Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Achraf Hakimi, the 26-year-old right-back for Paris Saint-Germain and Morocco, spoke to PSG TV. He shared his thoughts on last season’s Champions League victory, his current status, his objectives for the future, and the upcoming match against Bayern Munich this Tuesday (Matchday 4) at the Parc des Princes at 9 p.m CET. arts.ttl: PREVIEW | PSG vs Bayern Munich: Team news and predicted XIs
arts.sum: Bayern Munich travel to the French capital to face holders Paris Saint-Germain on Matchday four of the Champions League. Vincent Kompany’s side, along with PSG, are two of the favourites…
